name: Project Stocks
description:
Play. Trade. Win

Project Stocks is a stock trading simulator that blends strategy, competition, and a touch of market manipulation. This game mirrors the high-stakes environment of the financial world, allowing you a taste of stock market dynamics without any real-world financial risk.

Cards

This trading simulator introduces a unique twist with the integration of strategic cards. These cards enable you to tactically sway the market, steal from your opponents, or secure a cash boost during tight moments.

Upgrade and Excel

Invest in diverse upgrades to sharpen your trading strategies. From accelerating card rates to unlocking insider information, refine your approach and dominate the market with precision.

Unlock Multiplayer

Purchase DLC to access multiplayer and support the game's ongoing development. Play online with up to seven players or continue in single-player mode against three AI opponents!
